ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: and they are following hard upon their heels.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Yet they hasten to follow in their footsteps.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and they are running in their footsteps.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: So they hastily follow their footsteps!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: So they (too) hastened in their footsteps!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: So in their footsteps they are being hastened on.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and they run in their footsteps.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: But they make haste (to follow) in their footsteps.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: so they are rushing to follow in their footsteps.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: So they in their footsteps are rushing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: yet they press onwards in their footsteps.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: So they (too) were rushed down on their footsteps!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: So they (too) made haste to follow in their footsteps!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: yet they run in their footsteps,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And rushed along in their footsteps.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: So they hastened [to follow] in their footsteps.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [37:70] and so they are [also now] hurrying in their footsteps: they shall be prodded to follow them and they end up hurrying towards it [Hell-fire].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (But they make haste (to follow) in their footsteps) they hasten to follow their religion, and do as they did.
